thread.section_title: ToursByLocals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ToursByLocals | www.toursbylocals.com
thread.title: dbgeisler@mac.com dbgeisler@mac.com

author: dbgeisler@mac.com dbgeisler@mac.com
title: dbgeisler@mac.com dbgeisler@mac.com
text:
What an awesome tour hosted by our wonderful guide Casper!
Having never been to Beijing before my I couldn't have picked a more enjoyable way to see the city and surrounding area.
Casper is a charming, knowledgeable, friendly, professional guide who went above and beyond to make our tour FIRST CLASS in every way.
Our vehicle was very comfortable and Casper coordinated the travel schedule in a timely and efficient manner.
I again applaud Casper's expertise as a tour guide and highly recommend this tour!
